Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product holds immense value to us, encapsulating years of innovation and expertise. Considering its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $15000. We are confident that you will find its worth far exceeding this investment. Should you have any questions or need further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially serving you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
